item.description:
Winter is Here!! We have plenty of Snow and we are New Englanders!!! What do New Englanders do when its cold and we have a fresh coating of over a foot of snow???????????

WE GO TUBING!!!!!!!!!!!!

Let's go out to Amesbury Sports Park, have some fun and Laughs and also donate some food to Our Neighbors Table:

Price for Tubing: $22.00 for 3 hours of tubing

* Bring a non-perishable food item to receive $3.00 off the price of tubing. All donations go to Our Neighbors Table Food Pantry.

So grab those mittens, slide those feet into your boots and wrap that scarf around you..............It's time to act like kids and go tubing.

Hope to see you all on the hill, and don't forget that food donation.
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in front of the Cashier's booth
item.name: Tubing @ Amesbury Sportspark
